    • 构造器详细资料

      • cpu_Opponent

        public cpu_Opponent(int Difficulty,
                    int Team,
                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> OpponentTeams)
        Creates a new instance of the CPU Opponent object.
        参数:
        Difficulty - The number of moves the CPU will look ahead each turn.
        Team - Which team the CPU is. This should reflect the same property as it's pieces.

    • 方法详细资料

      • makeMove

        public BoardFactory makeMove(BoardFactory Board)
        Acts as the CPU taking its turn.
        参数:
        Board - The current BoardFactory state.
        返回:
        A BoardFactory representing the board after the CPU's turn.

      • findScore

        private int findScore(BoardFactory Board,
                      int Depth)
        Finds the score of the given board. For use in determining the best play for the CPU opponent to make.
        参数:
        Board - The game state to be evaluated.
        Depth - The number of turns to consider in the scoring. Also reflects the recursion depth.
        返回:
        An integer representing the score of the board, calculated from possible moves from this state.

      • findPossibilities

        private java.util.ArrayList<BoardFactory> findPossibilities(BoardFactory Board,
                                                            int Team)
        Finds all possible moves for a given player and board, and returns them as an arraylist of board states.
        参数:
        Board - The board of which to find all possible moves.
        Team - An integer representing the team for which to find possible moves.
        返回:
        An arraylist of all possible moves.

      • getNewBoard

        private BoardFactory getNewBoard(BoardFactory Board,
                                 PieceFactory Piece,
                                 int move)
        Gets the new board after the given move.\nYou'd think this being its own function is kinda dumb, but it's necessary to copy the Board and not change the current one.
        参数:
        Board - The board to copy.
        Piece - The piece to move.
        move - The move to make.
        返回:
        The board after the specified move.

      • evaluateBoard

        private int evaluateBoard(BoardFactory Board)
        Finds a score value for the given board. Pieces of the same team as this object are valued positively, while others are valued negatively. The total of these two values is returned and the score of the board.
        参数:
        Board - The board of which to find the score value.
        返回:
        An integer representing the score of this board.
